trans-unit.target: 关于设置Python开发环境的更多信息,如创建虚拟环境和安装

trans-unit.source: This is a sub-component of pyATS that handles result collection & reporting.
trans-unit.target: 这是pyATS的子组件，用于处理结果收集和报告。

trans-unit.source: on your system, please refer to Virtual Environment and Packages in Python tutorials.
trans-unit.target: 在您的系统上，请参考Python教程中的虚拟环境和软件包。

trans-unit.source: pyATS AEreport: Result Collection and Reporting
pyATS currently supports Python 3.4+ on Linux & Mac systems. Windows platforms are not yet supported.
trans-unit.target: pyATS当前在Linux和Mac系统上支持Python 3.4+。Windows平台尚不支持。

trans-unit.source: pyATS is an end-to-end testing ecosystem, specializing in data-driven and reusable testing, and engineered to be suitable for Agile, rapid development iterations. Extensible by design, pyATS enables developers start with small, simple and linear test cases, and scale towards large, complex and asynchronous test suites.
trans-unit.target: pyATS是一个端到端的测试生态系统,专注于数据驱动和可重用的测试,其设计适用于敏捷的快速开发迭代。pyATS通过设计实现了可扩展性,使开发人员能够从小型、简单和线性的测试案例开始,并向大型、复杂和异步测试套件扩展。

trans-unit.source: pyATS is initially developed internally in Cisco, and is now available to the general public starting late 2017 through Cisco DevNet. Visit the pyATS home page at
trans-unit.target: pyATS最初在Cisco内部开发，现在从2017年底开始通过Cisco DevNet对公众开放。访问pyATS主页，网址为
